# Answer for exercise c02-network02


AWS Range - 10.0.0.0/16 

Address:   10.0.0.0              00001010.00000000 .00000000.00000000
Netmask:   255.255.0.0 = 16      11111111.11111111 .00000000.00000000
Wildcard:  0.0.255.255           00000000.00000000 .11111111.11111111
=>
Network:   10.0.0.0/16           00001010.00000000 .00000000.00000000 (Class A)
Broadcast: 10.0.255.255          00001010.00000000 .11111111.11111111
HostMin:   10.0.0.1              00001010.00000000 .00000000.00000001
HostMax:   10.0.255.254          00001010.00000000 .11111111.11111110
Hosts/Net: 65534                 (Private Internet)

Subnets 1

Network:   10.0.0.0/18           00001010.00000000.00 000000.00000000 (Class A)
Broadcast: 10.0.63.255           00001010.00000000.00 111111.11111111
HostMin:   10.0.0.1              00001010.00000000.00 000000.00000001
HostMax:   10.0.63.254           00001010.00000000.00 111111.11111110
Hosts/Net: 16382                 (Private Internet) Hosts Available 

Subnets 2

Network:   10.0.64.0/18          00001010.00000000.01 000000.00000000 (Class A)
Broadcast: 10.0.127.255          00001010.00000000.01 111111.11111111
HostMin:   10.0.64.1             00001010.00000000.01 000000.00000001
HostMax:   10.0.127.254          00001010.00000000.01 111111.11111110
Hosts/Net: 16382                 (Private Internet) Hosts Available 

Subnets 3

Network:   10.0.128.0/18         00001010.00000000.10 000000.00000000 (Class A)
Broadcast: 10.0.191.255          00001010.00000000.10 111111.11111111
HostMin:   10.0.128.1            00001010.00000000.10 000000.00000001
HostMax:   10.0.191.254          00001010.00000000.10 111111.11111110
Hosts/Net: 16382                 (Private Internet) Hosts Available

Subnets 4

Network:   10.0.192.0/18         00001010.00000000.11 000000.00000000 (Class A)
Broadcast: 10.0.255.255          00001010.00000000.11 111111.11111111
HostMin:   10.0.192.1            00001010.00000000.11 000000.00000001
HostMax:   10.0.255.254          00001010.00000000.11 111111.11111110
Hosts/Net: 16382                 (Private Internet) Hosts Available 


AWS Range - 192.168.0.0/24

Address:   192.168.0.0           11000000.10101000.00000000 .00000000
Netmask:   255.255.255.0 = 24    11111111.11111111.11111111 .00000000
Wildcard:  0.0.0.255             00000000.00000000.00000000 .11111111
=>
Network:   192.168.0.0/24        11000000.10101000.00000000 .00000000 (Class C)
Broadcast: 192.168.0.255         11000000.10101000.00000000 .11111111
HostMin:   192.168.0.1           11000000.10101000.00000000 .00000001
HostMax:   192.168.0.254         11000000.10101000.00000000 .11111110
Hosts/Net: 254                   (Private Internet)


Subnet 1

Network:   192.168.0.0/26        11000000.10101000.00000000.00 000000 (Class C)
Broadcast: 192.168.0.63          11000000.10101000.00000000.00 111111
HostMin:   192.168.0.1           11000000.10101000.00000000.00 000001
HostMax:   192.168.0.62          11000000.10101000.00000000.00 111110
Hosts/Net: 62                    (Private Internet) Hosts Available 

Subnet 2

Network:   192.168.0.64/26       11000000.10101000.00000000.01 000000 (Class C)
Broadcast: 192.168.0.127         11000000.10101000.00000000.01 111111
HostMin:   192.168.0.65          11000000.10101000.00000000.01 000001
HostMax:   192.168.0.126         11000000.10101000.00000000.01 111110
Hosts/Net: 62                    (Private Internet) Hosts Availables 

Subnet 3

Network:   192.168.0.128/26      11000000.10101000.00000000.10 000000 (Class C)
Broadcast: 192.168.0.191         11000000.10101000.00000000.10 111111
HostMin:   192.168.0.129         11000000.10101000.00000000.10 000001
HostMax:   192.168.0.190         11000000.10101000.00000000.10 111110

Subnet 4

HostMin:   192.168.0.193         11000000.10101000.00000000.11 000001
HostMax:   192.168.0.254         11000000.10101000.00000000.11 111110
